title: What you can do with Docs - Google Workspace Learning Center
text: Write reports, create joint project proposals, keep track of meeting notes, and more. With Google Docs, you can create and edit text documents right in your web browser—no special software is required. Even better, multiple people can work at the same time, you can see people’s changes as they make them, and every change is saved automatically. What you need: 10 minutes Google Workspace account—Don't have one? Start your 14-day trial today. Google, Google Workspace, and related marks and logos are trademarks of Google LLC. All other company and product names are trademarks of the companies with which they are associated.
